about_the_game: Relive the legendary John McGuinness's 100th start with the perfect reproduction of the unique livery created for the occasion. For many riders and fans, John McGuinness, MBE, is considered one of the greatest racing legends: with 23 victories and 47 podiums,  he was the first rider to achieve an average speed of over 130 mph (209km/h) in 2007. This pack contains unique golden livery and an outfit celebrating John McGuinness's history with the TT Isle of Man.
detailed_description: Relive the legendary John McGuinness's 100th start with the perfect reproduction of the unique livery created for the occasion. For many riders and fans, John McGuinness, MBE, is considered one of the greatest racing legends: with 23 victories and 47 podiums,  he was the first rider to achieve an average speed of over 130 mph (209km/h) in 2007. This pack contains unique golden livery and an outfit celebrating John McGuinness's history with the TT Isle of Man.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 4130T (2.9 GHz) / AMD FX 6300 (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 (2 GB) / AMD Radeon HD 5970 (2 GB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play as the legendary John McGuinness and relive his 100th TT start, in the saddle of his unique golden motorbike, which celebrated his history with the race.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
